targets.query: SELECT mean("bps")/mean("iops") AS "io_size" FROM "io" WHERE ("vpsa" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND "dev_name" =~ /^$dev_name$/ AND "dev_server_name" =~ /^$dev_server_name$/ AND "bucket_name" =~ /^$bucket_name$/ AND "dev_ext_name" =~ /^$dev_ext_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "bucket_name" fill(null)

panels.title: Combined Latency Statistics (View Latency For All Devices of a Device Type on a Single Graph - Select Device Type on Top - e.g. "DRIVE", or "RAID-GROUP" + Server Type "CACHE")
Combined IOPS Statistics (View IOPS For All Devices of a Device Type on a Single Graph - Select Device Type on Top - e.g. "DRIVE", or "RAID-GROUP" + Server Type "CACHE")
Combined Throughput Statistics (View Throughput For All Devices of a Device Type on a Single Graph - Select Device Type on Top - e.g. "DRIVE", or "RAID-GROUP" + Server Type "CACHE")

targets.query: SELECT sum("bps") AS "throughput", sum("iops") AS "iops" FROM "io" WHERE "vpsa" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND "dev_name" = 'POOL' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "bucket_name" fill(null)
SELECT sum("bps") AS "throughput", sum("iops") AS "iops" FROM "io" WHERE "vpsa" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND "dev_name" = 'VOLUME' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "bucket_name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("cpu_iowait") AS "iowait", mean("cpu_system") AS "system", mean("cpu_user") AS "user", mean("cpu_system") + mean("cpu_user") AS "total_without_iowait" FROM "system" WHERE ("vpsa" =~ /^$vpsa$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("data_read_hit") AS "read_hit_rate", mean("data_write_hit") AS "write_hit_rate" FROM "zcache" WHERE "vpsa" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("meta_clean") + mean("meta_dirty") AS "metadata", mean("data_clean") AS "clean", mean("data_dirty") AS "dirty" FROM "zcache" WHERE "vpsa" =~ /^$vpsa$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.label: VPSA
list.name: vpsa
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "io" WITH KEY = "vpsa"

list.label: Device Type
list.name: dev_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "io" WITH KEY = "dev_name" WHERE "vpsa" =~ /$vpsa/

list.label: Server Name
list.name: dev_server_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "io" WITH KEY = "dev_server_name" WHERE "vpsa" =~ /$vpsa/ AND "dev_name" =~ /$dev_name/

list.label: Read/Write
list.name: bucket_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "io" WITH KEY = "bucket_name" WHERE "vpsa" =~ /$vpsa/ AND "dev_name" =~ /$dev_name/

list.label: Device Name
list.name: dev_ext_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "io" WITH KEY = "dev_ext_name" WHERE "vpsa" =~ /$vpsa/ AND "dev_name" =~ /$dev_name/ AND "dev_server_name" =~ /$dev_server_name/ AND bucket_name =~ /$bucket_name/
